reviews.review_msg: Didn't go to a single lecture and finished with an A. Textbook is free and optional to have. Slides are wordy so you don't need to go to class. Midterm, participation, final, and essay were all worth a lot but it's really easy to do well on them. Just be very familiar with information on slides. Don't really like PolSci but was a good class.
Awesome professor! He has a good sense of humor and does his best to answer your questions. His lectures are very organized and easy to understand. His textbook is also an easy/interesting read.

Pretty good prof. Talked to him once but was just asking to how to pronounce his name. If you have a prob with accent and ugly writing, don't even try. Not a lot of online help. But he can really teach. Hard to fall asleep in his class. Tests ARE LONG!! watch out. TAs are crap, can't mark.
